name: agent-cli
description: Agent CLI with mission mode parity

scripts.clean:release: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const r='release'; if (fs.existsSync(r)) { for (const f of fs.readdirSync(r)) { const p=path.join(r,f); if (fs.lstatSync(p).isDirectory()) { fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true}); } else if (/\.exe(\.sha256)?$/i.test(f)) { fs.rmSync(p,{force:true}); } } }"
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:release && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.rmSync('src/runtime_assets.generated.ts',{force:true});"
scripts.run-fresh: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const os=require('os'); const path=require('path'); const base=process.env.APPDATA||path.join(os.homedir(),'AppData','Roaming'); for (const name of ['agent-cli','agent_cli']) { const p=path.join(base,name); if (fs.existsSync(p)) fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true}); }" && npm run clean:all
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run gen:runtime-assets && vitest run src/tests
scripts.compile: npm run clean:artifacts && npm run clean:release && npm run gen:runtime-assets && tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit && node scripts/build_sea.cjs && npm run release:checksum && npm run clean:artifacts
